mod.name: Oz Mod
mod.description: A content mod adding in various things for different characters.

cards.name: Ichor Spray
cards.description: Apply 3 ozmod:Ichor to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Ichor Spray+
cards.description: Apply 5 ozmod:Ichor to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Orange Dagger
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Apply 2 ozmod:Ichor.

cards.name: Orange Dagger+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Apply 2 ozmod:Ichor.

cards.name: Gold Blood
cards.description: Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, apply 3 ozmod:Ichor to the attacker.

cards.name: Gold Blood+
cards.description: Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, apply 4 ozmod:Ichor to the attacker.

cards.name: Ichor Bath
cards.description:
Apply 10 ozmod:Ichor.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ichor Bath+
cards.description:
Apply 13 ozmod:Ichor.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Painful Shower
cards.description: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy and apply 2 ozmod:Ichor to that enemy X times. Exhaust.

cards.name: Painful Shower+
cards.description: Deal 7 damage to a random enemy and apply 3 ozmod:Ichor to that enemy X times. Exhaust.

cards.name: Blessed Touch
cards.description: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply 1 ozmod:Ichor.

cards.name: Blessed Touch+
cards.description: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply 1 ozmod:Ichor.

cards.name: Ichorsplosion
cards.description:
Apply an enemy's Ichor to itself and ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ichorsplosion+
cards.description:
Apply an enemy's Ichor to itself and ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Pollution
cards.description: Channel 1 Radiation.

cards.name: Pollution+
cards.description: Channel 1 Radiation.

cards.name: Toxic Slice
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Apply Poison equal to the number of channeled Radiation orbs.

cards.name: Toxic Slice+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Apply Poison equal to the number of channeled Radiation orbs.

cards.name: Radiator
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Channel 1 Radiation.

cards.name: Radiator+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Channel 1 Radiation.

cards.name: Harvest Plutonium
cards.description:
Exhaust your hand.
Channel that many Radiation orbs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Harvest Plutonium+
cards.description:
Exhaust your hand.
Channel that many Radiation orbs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Irradiated Core
cards.description: Whenever you Channel Radiation, gain [E] .

cards.name: Irradiated Core+
cards.description: Whenever you Channel Radiation, gain [E] .

cards.name: Nuclear Bomb
cards.description:
Deal 30 damage.
Channel 3 Radiation.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Nuclear Bomb+
cards.description:
Deal 40 damage.
Channel 4 Radiation.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Parry
cards.description: If an enemy is intending to attack, deal 5 damage and gain 7 Block.

cards.name: Parry+
cards.description: If an enemy is intending to attack, deal 7 damage and gain 9 Block.

cards.name: Flow Fist
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage X times.
Gain X [E] .

cards.name: Flow Fist+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage X times.
Gain X [E] .

cards.name: Focus Power
cards.description:
Your next attack does 2 times damage.
Your turn ends.

cards.name: Focus Power+
cards.description:
Your next attack does 3 times damage.
Your turn ends.

keywords.name: Ichor
keywords.description: Takes 10% more attack damage for every stack of Ichor. Loses 1 Ichor at the start of its turn.
